Class EntityTypeBuilder<TEntity>

Namespace
Innovt.Cloud.AWS.Dynamo.Mapping.Builder
Assembly
Innovt.Cloud.AWS.Dynamo.dll

A builder for defining the entity type and its properties for use with DynamoDB.

public sealed class EntityTypeBuilder<TEntity>

Type Parameters

TEntity

The type of the entity being defined.

The table name to set.
